content.question: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the most important factors for governments and communities to consider when addressing concerns about light pollution.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that synthesizes material from at least three of the sources and develops your position on the most important factors for governments and communities to consider when addressing concerns about light pollution.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
